mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.filter

Class BasicQueryFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.filter.BasicQueryFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistable, DistributableQueryFilter, QueryFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpatialQueryFilter

    public class BasicQueryFilter
extends Object
implements DistributableQueryFilter
    This filter can perform fine-grained acceptance testing on generic dimensions, but is limited to only using MBR (min-max in a single dimension, hyper-cubes in multi-dimensional space)
